pages.text: In order to bind poppets to a player you need to obtain a taglock of said player first. This can be done with the Taglock Kit. The Taglock Kit can be filled in three ways: $(li)Right clicking on a player to obtain their taglock $(li)Shift right clicking in the air to obtain your taglock $(li)Right clicking a bed to obtain the taglock of the latest sleeper in this bed
After you obtained a taglock you can craft it together with an unbound poppet to bind the poppet to the owner of the taglock.
